Articles.Content:
I saw this one on facebook and i quite enjoyed it.
You can Ask for one wish.
The wish will be granted but it will be corrupted. you then post your wish for the next person to grant the corrupted wish.
Example:

User 1: I wish for a Car.

User 2: Granted! But it has no engine.
I wish for a million dollars

User 3: Granted but it will all be stolen in two days.
I wish....

I'll Start:

I wish for World Peace.
I'm locking this one up, because there's already a thread for this game
